16  package com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache;
17  
18  import com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.SignatureUtils;
19  import java.io.File;
20  import java.net.URI;
21  import java.nio.file.Files;
22  import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
23  import java.security.MessageDigest;
24  import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils;
25  
26  /**
27   * A class representing a download cache
28   * @author Mickael Istria (Red Hat Inc)
29   *
30   */
31  public class DownloadCache {
32  
33  	private final File basedir;
34      private final FileIndex index;
35  
36  	public DownloadCache(File cacheDirectory) {
37          DownloadCache.createIfNeeded(cacheDirectory);
38          this.index = new FileBackedIndex(cacheDirectory);
39          this.basedir = cacheDirectory;
40      }
41  
42  	private String getEntry(URI uri, String md5, String sha1, String sha512) throws Exception {
43  		if (!this.index.contains(uri)) {
44  			return null;
45  		}
46  		final String res = this.index.get(uri);
47  		File resFile = new File(this.basedir, res);
48  		if (!resFile.isFile()) {
49  			return null;
50  		}
51  		if (md5 != null && !md5.equals(SignatureUtils.getMD5(resFile))) {
52  			return null;
53  		}
54  		if (sha1 != null && !sha1.equals(SignatureUtils.getSHA1(resFile))) {
55  			return null;
56  		}
57  		if (sha512 != null && !sha512.equals(SignatureUtils.getSHA512(resFile))) {
58  			return null;
59  		}
60  		return res;
61  	}
62  
63  	/**
64  	 * Get a File in the download cache. If no cache for this URL, or
65  	 * if expected signatures don't match cached ones, returns null.
66  	 * available in cache,
67  	 * @param uri URL of the file
68  	 * @param md5 MD5 signature to verify file. Can be null =&gt; No check
69  	 * @param sha1 Sha1 signature to verify file. Can be null =&gt; No check
70  	 * @return A File when cache is found, null if no available cache
71  	 */
72      public File getArtifact(URI uri, String md5, String sha1, String sha512) throws Exception {
73  		String res = getEntry(uri, md5, sha1, sha512);
74  		if (res != null) {
75  			return new File(this.basedir, res);
76  		}
77  		return null;
78  	}
79  
80      public void install(URI uri, File outputFile, String md5, String sha1, String sha512) throws Exception {
81  		if (md5 == null) {
82  			md5 = SignatureUtils.computeSignatureAsString(outputFile, MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5"));
83  		}
84  		if (sha1 == null) {
85  			sha1 = SignatureUtils.computeSignatureAsString(outputFile, MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA1"));
86  		}
87  		if (sha512 == null) {
88  			sha512 = SignatureUtils.computeSignatureAsString(outputFile, MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-512"));
89  		}
90  		String entry = getEntry(uri, md5, sha1, sha512);
91  		if (entry != null) {
92  			return; // entry already here
93  		}
94  		String fileName = outputFile.getName() + '_' + DigestUtils.md5Hex(uri.toString());
95  		Files.copy(outputFile.toPath(), new File(this.basedir, fileName).toPath(), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
96  		// update index
97  		this.index.put(uri, fileName);
98  	}
99  
100     private static void createIfNeeded(final File basedir) {
101         if (!basedir.exists()) {
102             basedir.mkdirs();
103         } else if (!basedir.isDirectory()) {
104             throw new IllegalArgumentException(
105                 String.format(
106                     "Cannot use %s as cache directory: file is already exist",
107                     basedir
108                 )
109             );
110         }
111     }
112 }
